## Land

Table 1: Baseline
```{r base, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
Land_18_19 <- read.csv("~/R/Rautahat.Bara.Sarlahi/data/Land_18_19.csv")
dfb <- Land_18_19 %>% 
  filter(year==2018,total_land_cultivated_year>0) %>%
  mutate(ci=total_land_cultivated/nca,ii=irrigated_out_of_tot_land_cult/nca) %>%
  group_by( household_questionnaire_id) %>%
  summarise(own=sum(total_ownland_cultivated)*0.0338,
            cult=sum(total_land_cultivated)*0.0338) %>% 
  summarise(N=n(), `Ownland Cultivated`=mean(own),`Land Cultivated`=mean(cult)) %>% 
  mutate(across(is.numeric, round, 2))

kable(dfb, "latex", booktabs = T,align = "lccccc") %>% 
row_spec(0, bold = T, color = "black", background = NULL )

```

## Intensity
Baseline
```{r Intensity, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
dfI <- Land_18_19 %>% 
  filter(year==2018,total_land_cultivated_year>0) %>%
  mutate(ci=total_land_cultivated/nca,ii=irrigated_out_of_tot_land_cult/nca) %>%
  group_by( household_questionnaire_id) %>%
  summarise(own=sum(total_ownland_cultivated)*0.0338,
            cult=sum(total_land_cultivated)*0.0338,
            irrigated=sum(irrigated_out_of_tot_land_cult)*0.0338,
            crop_intensity=sum(ci),irrigate_intensity=sum(ii)) %>% 
  summarise(N=n(),`Croping Intensity`=mean(crop_intensity),`Irrigation Intensity`=mean(irrigate_intensity)) %>% 
  mutate(across(is.numeric, round, 2))

kable(dfI, "latex", booktabs = T,align = "lccccc") %>% 
row_spec(0, bold = T, color = "black", background = NULL )

```
